explains: v. 推迟（defer 的过去式及过去分词形式）
wordGroup: deferred income 递延收入，递延收益

sentences.en: She had applied for deferred admission to college.
The department deferred the decision for six months.
sentences.cn: 这个部门推迟了六个月才作决定。

sentences.en: Any significant changes should be deferred to a future generation of the solution to maintain its stability.
sentences.cn: 任何重大更改都应推迟到该解决方案的下一代，以保持其稳定性。
